clishell.db

Class CliCommandDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • clishell.db.CliCommandDb

  • public class CliCommandDb
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates data structures used to store and quickly find the set of cli commands currently loaded across all plugins.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CliCommandDb()

        public CliCommandDb()

    • Method Detail

      • findCommandNamesFromCommandLine

        public java.util.Set<CommandName> findCommandNamesFromCommandLine(CommandName commandWithParameters)
        Returns:
        set of full command names that match the initial token(s) of the supplied commandWithParameters
        See Also:
        FullCommandNameTree.findCommandNamesFromCommandLine(CommandName)

      • printCommandDbAsTree

        public void printCommandDbAsTree(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Parameters:
        out - "dumps" the command tree to the specified print writer, mainly useful for debugging

      • addCommands

        public void addCommands(java.lang.String pluginName,
                        java.util.Collection<CliPluginCommandMetadata> commandMetadataCollection)
                 throws CliRunnerException
        Parameters:
        pluginName - plugin supporting the commands in commandMetadataCollection
        commandMetadataCollection - collection of commands to register into command database
        Throws:
        CliRunnerException - unhandled exception from adding command(s); NOTE: if thrown, it's likely that not all commands in the collection were loaded for the plugin

      • removeCommands

        public void removeCommands(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Removes all commands registered for the specified plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginName - unique identifier for plugin

      • getCommandMetadata

        public CliPluginCommandMetadata getCommandMetadata(java.lang.String pluginName,
                                                   CommandName commandName)
        Parameters:
        pluginName - unique identifier for plugin
        commandName - specifies command for which to retrieve metadata
        Returns:
        CLI plugin command metadata supporting commandName, or null if not found
